memory_performance: Your memory performance peaks between 10AM-2PM. Schedule challenging exercises during this window for optimal results.

stroop_test.name: Stroop Test
stroop_test.description: Select color of text, not the word itself!

instructions.1: You will see a color name
instructions.2: The text will be in a different color
instructions.3: Choose COLOR of text, ignore the word

memory_cards.name: Memory Cards
memory_cards.description: Find all matching pairs of cards!

instructions.1: Tap a card to flip it

n_back.name: N-Back Test
n_back.prompt: Press "Yes" if current item matches item N steps back

instructions.1: You will see a sequence of items
instructions.2: Press "Yes" if current item matches item N steps back

quick_math.name: Quick Math
quick_math.description: Solve math problems as fast as you can!
quick_math.instruction1: Solve the problem as fast as you can
quick_math.instruction2: Choose the correct answer from 4 options

speed_reading.name: Speed Reading
speed_reading.description: Train your reading speed and comprehension!

spot_difference.name: Spot Difference
spot_difference.description: Find all differences between two grids!

instructions.1: Unscramble letters to form a word
instructions.3: Use hints if you get stuck

instructions.1: Fill each row, column, and 3x3 box with 1-9
instructions.2: No number can repeat in any row, column, or box
instructions.3: Use notes to mark possible numbers

schulte_tables.name: Schulte Tables

instructions.2: Tap each number as quickly as possible
instructions.3: Keep focus on the center of the table
instructions.4: Use peripheral vision to scan the grid

schulte_tables.tip: Tip: Keep your focus on the center of the table and use peripheral vision

memory_matrix.name: Memory Matrix

instructions.3: Select the correct emojis for hidden cells

medium: The ancient library contained many books

reading_with_hidden_lines.name: Reading with Hidden Lines
reading_with_hidden_lines.description: Read text with top portion of each line hidden

instructions.2: Top 30% of each line is hidden
instructions.3: After reading, answer questions about the text

reading_with_hidden_lines.question: Question

masked_text.name: Masked Text
masked_text.description: Read text with partially hidden lines

instructions.1: Read the text carefully. The top part of each line is hidden.
instructions.2: You will have limited time to read based on difficulty level.
instructions.3: Answer questions about the text you just read.

masked_text.question: Question

visual_math_puzzles.name: Visual Math Puzzles
visual_math_puzzles.description: Solve equations with icons instead of numbers

instructions.2: Each icon represents a specific number
instructions.4: Solve final equation and select correct answer

visual_math_puzzles.question: Question:

bourdon_letters.name: Bourdon Test: Letters
bourdon_letters.instruction1: Find and count all occurrences of the target letter(s)
bourdon_letters.instruction2: Scan the grid carefully - don't miss any!
bourdon_letters.instruction3: Select the correct answer from the options
bourdon_letters.instruction4: Submit your answer before time runs out

bourdon_dice_dots.name: Bourdon Test: Dice Dots
bourdon_dice_dots.instruction1: Count groups with the specified number of dots
bourdon_dice_dots.instruction2: Dots are arranged like on dice
bourdon_dice_dots.instruction3: Select the correct answer from the options
bourdon_dice_dots.instruction4: Submit your answer before time runs out

bourdon_constellation.name: Bourdon Test: Constellations
bourdon_constellation.instruction1: Count groups with the specified number of dots
bourdon_constellation.instruction2: Dots are in random positions - count carefully!
bourdon_constellation.instruction3: Select the correct answer from the options
bourdon_constellation.instruction4: Submit your answer before time runs out

bourdon_numbers.name: Bourdon Test: Numbers
bourdon_numbers.instruction1: Find and count all occurrences of the target number(s)
bourdon_numbers.instruction2: Scan the grid carefully - don't miss any!
bourdon_numbers.instruction3: Select the correct answer from the options
bourdon_numbers.instruction4: Submit your answer before time runs out

legal.privacy_policy.title: Privacy Policy
legal.privacy_policy.sections.informatio: We collect information you provide directly, such as your name, email address, and learning preferences. We also collect usage data to improve our services.
legal.privacy_policy.sections.use_of_dat: Your data is used to provide personalized learning experiences, track your progress, and improve our AI algorithms. We do not sell your personal information to third parties.
legal.privacy_policy.sections.data_stora: Your data is stored securely on our servers using industry-standard encryption. You can request deletion of your data at any time.
legal.privacy_policy.sections.data_prote: We implement appropriate security measures to protect your personal information from unauthorized access, alteration, or disclosure.
legal.privacy_policy.sections.our_rights: We reserve the right to update this privacy policy at any time. Continued use of the app constitutes acceptance of any changes.
legal.terms_of_service.title: Terms of Service
legal.terms_of_service.sections.acceptan: By using this app, you agree to these terms of service. If you do not agree, please do not use the app.
legal.terms_of_service.sections.user_res: You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account and for all activities under your account.
legal.terms_of_service.sections.intellec: All content and materials in this app are owned by us and protected by intellectual property laws.
legal.terms_of_service.sections.limitati: We are not liable for any damages arising from the use or inability to use this app.
legal.terms_of_service.sections.terminat: We reserve the right to terminate or suspend your account at our sole discretion, without notice.
legal.terms_of_service.sections.subscrip: Subscriptions are billed through the app store and can be cancelled at any time.
